titleStmt.title: HOPE.
titleStmt.author: Anne Finch (née Kingsmill), countess of Winchilsea

publicationStmt.idno: Anne Finch (née Kingsmill), countess of Winchilsea_hope

bibl.title: HOPE.
bibl.author: Anne Finch (née Kingsmill), countess of Winchilsea

lg.l: THE Tree of we in prov'd;
The Tree of was thence to Heav'n remov'd:
is the growth of Earth, the only Plant,
Which either Heav'n, or Paradice cou'd want.
Hell knows it not, to Us alone confin'd,
And Cordial only to the Human Mind.
Receive it then, t'expel these mortal Cares,
Nor wave a Med'cine, which thy God prepares.
